dialogue.context: seeing ordinary world with new eyes
dialogue.text: The world looks the same, but I see it with spiral eyes now.

psychological_notes: Integration completeâ€”Evan returns to ordinary world but with transformed perception. He sees the spiral pattern everywhere, recognizing that everyone is on the journey whether conscious of it or not. This represents successful return from psychological journey with gifts to share.
philosophical_underpinning: The ordinary world as sacred, linear appearance hiding spiral reality
therapeutic_direction: Client ready to live in world with new understanding
